data.title: #LeaveRussia: Renault Group Closed its Business in Russia
data.meta_description: #LeaveRussia: Renault Group Closed its Business in Russia
data.text:
Renault Russia was a Russian automotive company, part of the Renault group. Headquartered in Moscow, production facilities were located in Moscow and Togliatti. For 2015, it was included in the list of backbone organizations in Russia. Russia to launch Moskvich car production at former Renault plant in December 2022.

Sell Renault Russia; transfer Moscow factory to city government and partner for local brand production. 03.06.2022: Full name changed from CJSC "RENO RUSSIA" to JOINT STOCK COMPANY "MOSKOVSKY AVTOMOBILINY ZAVOD "MOSKVICH". The French company sold its stake in Russiaâ€™s largest automaker for one ruble, with the option of returning within six years. Russian car dealers are suing Renault over the group's exit from the market.
